trans-unit.source: Contains properties and methods to provide consistent look and feel to all root designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Contém propriedades e métodos para fornecer aparência consistente para todos os designers de raiz em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Typically, an instance of a sequential workflow root designer class is created when a workflow is created in a workflow designer and it represents the designer surface on which users can add and edit activities.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Normalmente, uma instância de uma classe designer do fluxo de trabalho sequencial raiz é criada quando um fluxo de trabalho é criado em um designer de fluxo de trabalho e representa a superfície do designer em que os usuários podem adicionar e editar atividades.

trans-unit.source: A workflow root designer does not have a parent designer unless it is the child of an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: Um designer de fluxo de trabalho raiz não tem um designer de pai, a menos que ele é o filho de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity>atividade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: All workflow root designers must derive from SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.
trans-unit.target: Todos os designers de raiz de fluxo de trabalho devem derivar de SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> can be set as the parent of the activity associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref> pode ser definido como o pai da atividade associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: Root designers cannot have a parent activity designer on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Designers de raiz não podem ter um designer de atividade pai em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in an inheriting class, CanBeParentedTo returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituído em uma classe herdada, CanBeParentedTo retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> para verificar.

trans-unit.source: to allow the activity associated with parentActivityDesigner to be the parent of the activity associated with the ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: para permitir que a atividade associada parentActivityDesigner para ser o pai da atividade associada com o ; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer can be expanded and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer pode ser expandido e recolhido.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a deriving class, CanExpandCollapse is always set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída em uma classe derivada, CanExpandCollapse é sempre definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref> can be expanded and collapsed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref> podem ser expandidos e recolhidos; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the footer associated with the root designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o rodapé associado com o designer raiz.

trans-unit.source: The contents of Footer appear at the bottom of the root designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do rodapé aparece na parte inferior do designer raiz na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Icons and text can be displayed in the footer, including button icons that change the designer view when a user selects one of them.
trans-unit.target: Ícones e o texto podem ser exibidas no rodapé, incluindo os ícones de botão Alterar o modo de exibição designer quando um usuário seleciona um deles.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> that represents the footer associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref> que representa o rodapé associado a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of points that represent the inner connection of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção somente leitura de pontos que representam a conexão interna do designer.

trans-unit.source: A designer can have connectors within it.
trans-unit.target: Um designer pode ter conectores dentro dele.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> on which to gather the collection of connection points.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"> </xref> no qual obter a coleção de pontos de conexão.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> objects used for a connectable designer.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que contém o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref> objetos usados para um designer conectável.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of glyphs that are displayed on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de glifos que são exibidos no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"></xref> that contains the glyphs displayed on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"> </xref> que contém os glifos exibidos no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the header associated with the root designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o cabeçalho associado com o designer raiz.

trans-unit.source: The contents of Header appear at the top of the root designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do cabeçalho aparece na parte superior do designer raiz na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Icons and text can be displayed in the header, including text that indicates the designer view that is currently displayed on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Ícones e texto podem ser exibidos no cabeçalho, incluindo o texto que indica o modo de exibição designer que está sendo exibido na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> that represents the header associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref> que representa o cabeçalho associado a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the image associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a imagem associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: Image property is set to the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> to display.
trans-unit.target: Propriedade Image é definida o <xref:System.Drawing.Image>para exibir.</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: You can do this at design time or at run time.
trans-unit.target: Você pode fazer isso em tempo de design ou em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, Image returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída em uma classe derivada, imagem retorna uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to associate with the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> para associar com o designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value for the enclosing bounds of the image associated with the designer in logical coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor para os limites da imagem associada com o designer em coordenadas lógicas do delimitadores.

trans-unit.source: Use the ImageRectangle to retrieve the coordinates for the rectangle that encloses the image associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Use o ImageRectangle para recuperar as coordenadas para o retângulo que contém a imagem associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: You can use these coordinates for drawing connectors or overlaying graphics.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essas coordenadas para desenhar conectores ou sobreposição de elementos gráficos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that encloses the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> displayed for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que inclui o <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> exibido para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> that requested the sequential workflow root designer to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> que solicitou o designer de raiz de fluxo de trabalho sequencial seja inicializada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> that requested the workflow root designer to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> que solicitou o designer de raiz de fluxo de trabalho a ser inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho mínimo para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: MinimumSize represents the smallest size to which a user can resize the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: MinimumSize representa o tamanho do menor para o qual um usuário pode redimensionar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the minimum size of the sequential workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho mínimo do designer de fluxo de trabalho sequencial.

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define o tamanho das indicações visuais sobre os designers de dentro do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os argumentos de layout.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the size of the visual cues on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho das indicações visuais no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws any headers and footers associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Desenha os cabeçalhos e rodapés associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: OnPaint draws any text to include in the headers and footers with the appropriate theme settings.
trans-unit.target: OnPaint desenha qualquer texto a ser incluído em cabeçalhos e rodapés com as configurações apropriadas do tema.

trans-unit.source: It also draws any images to include in the headers and footers.
trans-unit.target: Ele também se baseia as imagens para incluir nos cabeçalhos e rodapés.

trans-unit.source: **Note** When you override OnPaint in a derived class, be sure to call the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: **Observação** ao substituir OnPaint em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A>método da classe base, de modo que registrado delegados receber o evento.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: econtém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer whether smart tags are to be shown or hidden on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o designer se as marcas inteligentes devem ser mostrados ou ocultados no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When called, OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged invalidates the text rectangle associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamado, OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged invalida o retângulo do texto associado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note** When you override OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: **Observação** ao substituir OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A>método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnSmartTagVisibilityChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display smart tags on the designer surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para exibir as marcas inteligentes na superfície do designer; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the root designer displays smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer raiz exibe as marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A> property is not set to a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) and the corresponding <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text%2A> property is not an empty string or set to a null reference (`Nothing`), ShowSmartTag returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>propriedade não está definida como uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) e o correspondente <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text%2A>propriedade não está vazio de cadeia de caracteres ou definido como uma referência nula (`Nothing`), retorna ShowSmartTag `true`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref> displays smart tags; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref> exibe marcas inteligentes; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle on the designer surface in which to display a smart tag.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo na superfície do designer de exibição de uma marca inteligente.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.SmartTagVerbs%2A> to display a smart tag of available <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DesignerActions%2A> at the location specified by SmartTagRectangle.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.SmartTagVerbs%2A>para exibir uma marca inteligente de disponíveis <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DesignerActions%2A>no local especificado por SmartTagRectangle.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.DesignerActions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.SmartTagVerbs%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.ShowSmartTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds in which to display the smart tag.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que define os limites de exibição de marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a descrição associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in an inheriting class, Text returns <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituído em uma classe herdada, texto retorna <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the description associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a descrição associada com o designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the title area of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura da área de título do designer.

trans-unit.source: A root designer title area typically contains the header and any icon associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Uma área de título designer raiz normalmente contém o cabeçalho e qualquer ícone associado com o designer.

trans-unit.source: TitleHeight calculates the integer it returns by getting the value of its base implementation and adding the height integer defined for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.
trans-unit.target: TitleHeight calcula o número de inteiro retorna obtendo o valor de sua implementação de base e adicionando o inteiro de altura definido para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner.Header%2A>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the height of the title area of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa a altura da área de título do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.
